lead_paragraph: Chelsea players must fight for their futures at the club under interim manager Guus Hiddink, goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois said after Saturday's 3-0 Premier League win over Crystal Palace stretched their unbeaten run to four games.

headline.print_headline: Players Fighting for Futures Under Hiddink, Says Courtois
headline.main: Players Fighting for Futures Under Hiddink, Says Courtois

snippet: Chelsea players must fight for their futures at the club under interim manager Guus Hiddink, goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois said after Saturday's 3-0 Premier League win over Crystal Palace stretched their unbeaten run to four games....
